评论概述: Love these & wish they came in silver
评论详情: These are larger and more noticeable than most Huggies, yet very lightweight. The post is recessed causing the earrings sit above your piercing which hides sagging lobes/stretched holes. Although these are very inexpensive, the clasps don’t fail or loosen and the gold coating maintains its color and shine over time. I frequently wear these in the pool and they’ve held up great. I’ve bought more in case they become unavailable. The versions that come in silver /white gold have different charms and the posts aren’t recessed.
